channel.title: Junebug
channel.desc: 40-year-old book editor Juniper is magically reconnected with an eight-year-old version of herself who questions her life choices, including the dream of writing her own stories.

channel.desc: Three friends reunite in Tuscany, where they relish in the importance of friendship and inspire each other to make their next year the best one yet.

channel.title: A Missed Connection
channel.desc: Five years after finding a spark with a stranger on a train platform, a photographer finds himself seated next to the same woman on a plane heading to the same wedding - hers.

channel.title: Campfire Romance
channel.desc: Romance rekindles for Peyton and her closest friends when her parents decide to host a holiday themed reunion before selling their family owned summer camp.

channel.title: Perfect Harmony
channel.desc: Best Man Jack and Maid of Honour Professor Barrett may not sing from the same hymn sheet, but working together on their friends' wedding might just result in a duet of a lifetime.

channel.desc: Chef and owner of The Loving Spoonful, Lia, learns how to accept help - and love - when she tries to expand her food delivery business.
